import React from 'react' import {useEndpoint} from '../useEndpoint' export default function ProductPopUp({closeModal}, props) { let data = useEndpoint() function filterById(jsonObject, id) { return jsonObject.filter(function(jsonObject) {return (jsonObject['id'] === id);}); } filterById(data, props.key) return (

{props.name}

${props.price}

{props.rating} stars

{props.desc}
) }
